columns.name: TRANSACTION_ID
columns.desc: Primary key; unique identifier for the receiving transaction.

columns.name: TRANSACTION_TYPE
columns.desc: Type of receiving transaction (e.g., RECEIVE, RETURN TO VENDOR, CORRECT).

columns.name: TRANSACTION_DATE
columns.desc: Date when the transaction was recorded.

columns.name: QUANTITY
columns.desc: Transaction quantity in the specified unit of measure.

columns.name: UNIT_OF_MEASURE
columns.desc: Unit of measure used for the transaction.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID
columns.desc: FK to RCV_SHIPMENT_HEADERS; identifies the shipment header.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_LINE_ID
columns.desc: FK to RCV_SHIPMENT_LINES; identifies the shipment line.

columns.name: USER_ENTERED_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates whether the transaction was user-entered (Y/N).

columns.name: INTERFACE_SOURCE_CODE
columns.desc: Source code of the interface transaction (e.g., Inventory, Purchasing).

columns.name: INTERFACE_SOURCE_LINE_ID
columns.desc: Line ID of the source interface transaction.

columns.name: INV_TRANSACTION_ID
columns.desc: FK to Inventory transaction (INV) that links this transaction to inventory movement.

columns.name: SOURCE_DOCUMENT_CODE
columns.desc: Type of source document (PO, RMA, etc.).

columns.name: DESTINATION_TYPE_CODE
columns.desc: Type of destination (INVENTORY, EXPENSE, SHOP FLOOR, etc.).

columns.name: PRIMARY_QUANTITY
columns.desc: Transaction quantity in the item's primary unit of measure.

columns.name: PRIMARY_UNIT_OF_MEASURE
columns.desc: Primary unit of measure of the item.

columns.name: UOM_CODE
columns.desc: Abbreviation for the unit of measure (e.g., EA, KG).

columns.name: EMPLOYEE_ID
columns.desc: FK to PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F; receiver of the goods.

columns.name: PARENT_TRANSACTION_ID
columns.desc: FK to the parent transaction (for corrections/returns).

columns.name: PO_HEADER_ID
columns.desc: FK to PO_HEADERS_ALL; purchase order header ID.

columns.name: PO_RELEASE_ID
columns.desc: FK to PO_RELEASES_ALL; release ID if applicable (for blanket orders).

columns.name: PO_LINE_ID
columns.desc: FK to PO_LINES_ALL; purchase order line ID.

columns.name: PO_LINE_LOCATION_ID
columns.desc: FK to PO_LINE_LOCATIONS_ALL; shipment line ID.

columns.name: PO_DISTRIBUTION_ID
columns.desc: FK to PO_DISTRIBUTIONS_ALL; distribution ID.

columns.name: PO_REVISION_NUM
columns.desc: Revision number of the purchase order at the time of receipt.

columns.name: REQUISITION_LINE_ID
columns.desc: FK to requisition line (REQ_LINES_ALL) if sourced via requisition.

columns.name: PO_UNIT_PRICE
columns.desc: Unit price from the PO at the time of receipt.

columns.name: CURRENCY_CODE
columns.desc: Foreign currency code for the transaction (if applicable).

columns.name: CURRENCY_CONVERSION_TYPE
columns.desc: Type of currency conversion used (User, Spot, Corporate, etc.).

columns.name: CURRENCY_CONVERSION_RATE
columns.desc: Rate applied to convert foreign currency to base currency.

columns.name: CURRENCY_CONVERSION_DATE
columns.desc: Date when the currency conversion was applied.

columns.name: ROUTING_HEADER_ID
columns.desc: FK to receiving routing header (RCV_ROUTING_HEADERS).

columns.name: ROUTING_STEP_ID
columns.desc: Not currently used; reserved for future enhancements.

columns.name: DELIVER_TO_PERSON_ID
columns.desc: FK to requester receiving the item.

columns.name: DELIVER_TO_LOCATION_ID
columns.desc: Location ID where the goods were delivered.

columns.name: VENDOR_ID
columns.desc: FK to AP_SUPPLIERS; supplier ID.

columns.name: VENDOR_SITE_ID
columns.desc: FK to AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL; supplier site ID.

columns.name: ORGANIZATION_ID
columns.desc: Destination organization ID (inventory org).

columns.name: SUBINVENTORY
columns.desc: Name of the destination subinventory.

columns.name: INSPECTION_STATUS_CODE
columns.desc: Status of quality inspection (e.g., ACCEPTED, REJECTED).

columns.name: ACCRUAL_STATUS_CODE
columns.desc: Accrual status for accounting (e.g., ACCRUED, NOT ACCRUED).

columns.name: REASON_ID
columns.desc: FK to reason codes; explains the reason for the transaction (e.g., damaged goods).

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.desc: Receiver's comments for the transaction.

columns.name: SECONDARY_QUANTITY
columns.desc: Quantity in the item's secondary unit of measure (if applicable).

columns.name: SECONDARY_UNIT_OF_MEASURE
columns.desc: Secondary unit of measure (e.g., CASES, BOXES).

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.desc: Amount value (useful for service-based transactions).

key_columns.name: VENDOR_SITE_ID
key_columns.desc: FK to AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL; supplier site ID.

key_columns.name: CURRENCY_CODE
key_columns.desc: Foreign currency code for the transaction (if applicable).

key_columns.name: PO_HEADER_ID
key_columns.desc: FK to PO_HEADERS_ALL; purchase order header ID.

key_columns.name: PO_LINE_ID
key_columns.desc: FK to PO_LINES_ALL; purchase order line ID.

key_columns.name: QUANTITY
key_columns.desc: Transaction quantity in the specified unit of measure.

key_columns.name: TRANSACTION_ID
key_columns.desc: Primary key; unique identifier for the receiving transaction.

key_columns.name: TRANSACTION_TYPE
key_columns.desc: Type of receiving transaction (e.g., RECEIVE, RETURN TO VENDOR, CORRECT).

key_columns.name: TRANSACTION_DATE
key_columns.desc: Date when the transaction was recorded.

key_columns.name: UNIT_OF_MEASURE
key_columns.desc: Unit of measure used for the transaction.

key_columns.name: SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID
key_columns.desc: FK to RCV_SHIPMENT_HEADERS; identifies the shipment header.

key_columns.name: SHIPMENT_LINE_ID
key_columns.desc: FK to RCV_SHIPMENT_LINES; identifies the shipment line.

key_columns.name: USER_ENTERED_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Indicates whether the transaction was user-entered (Y/N).

notes: rcv_transactions logs all receiving and delivery transactions, tracking goods receipt, returns, and delivery. rcv_transactions records all receiving transactions related to goods received from or returned to suppliers, uniquely identified by transaction_id. Important transaction types include RECEIVE (goods received at staging), DELIVER (goods moved to warehouse), RETURN TO RECEIVING (back to staging), and RETURN TO SUPPLIER (goods sent back). For goods in staging, calculate: Received - Delivered + Return to Receiving - Return to Supplier quantities, summed by po_distribution_id. For net received/supplied quantities, consider only RECEIVE and RETURN TO SUPPLIER, ignoring internal moves.
